trait.name: Awakening of the Scion
entries: The cradle is a container for the {@creature scion of Surtur|BGG}. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body hardens and crumbles to ash. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cradle makes three Slam or Hurl Lava attacks in any combination.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Lava
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 17} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature within 5 feet of the fire takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Erupting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The cradle exhales flames and volcanic gases in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage and has the {@condition poisoned} condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.
A creature {@condition poisoned} in this way can make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
